onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:title: 2006 Ice Watch Joint Ocean Ice Study (JOIS) Sea Ice Observation Program
onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:subject: sea ice observations
sea ice dynamics
satellite validation
Beaufort Sea

onedcx:dcTerms.dcterms:abstract:
The cruise occurred over the time of minimum ice extent, providing a snapshot of ice conditions at the end of the 2006 melt season.
Ship-based sea ice observation data collected along the CCGS Louis S. St. Laurent ship track during the late melt season.
